description.value:
Mechadendrite equipped with Dendrite Blade Weapon (Melee;1d10+4;Pen 3;Flexible, Razor Sharp). Requires Mechadendrite Use (Weapon) Talent to use. For each Dendrite Blade inflict -10 to WS of anyone attacking you in melee, up to -30. If attacker fails their melee attack by 3+ DoF they are hit by 1 Dendrite blade, +1 per additional DoF up to number of Dendrite Blades character has.

Requirements

Can have up to Toughness Bonus Mechadendrites. Requires Mechanicus Implants. Heretical. See Dendrite Blade in Weapons Tab

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
